title: Dhanu Prasad's 5-Wicket Haul Scripts Dominant Win for Uttarakhand Eagles in Match 3: YSCLeague Nationals 2025
description: New Delhi, October 25, 2025 - The Uttarakhand Eagles made a strong statement with a comprehensive victory, led by Dhanu Prasad's exceptional bowling performance. The team showcased remarkable teamwork and strategic play throughout the match, securing their position in the tournament standings.

title: Dk Dhaliwal's Explosive Fifty and Captain Akshay Verma's Spell Power Surat Catamounts to Victory in YSCLeague Nationals
description: New Delhi, October 24, 2025 - The action at the TCL Nationals continued with Surat Catamounts securing a thrilling victory. Dk Dhaliwal's explosive batting display combined with Captain Akshay Verma's exceptional bowling performance created an unforgettable match.
